name: Magic
content: Just a flicker in the streetlight
That you don't even know yet
So maybe take a chance tonight
Cause I can see the colour blue
Let you finally light up the dark
You can make it come true
No one to get you through
With no one to hold you
And the nights are lonely too
Because you know who you are
So baby take a chance tonight
Cause I can see your colours true
Yeah you got nothing to lose
Let you finally light up the dark
You can make it come true
So maybe take a chance tonight
Cause I can see your colours true
Yeah you got nothing to lose
Let you finally light up the dark
You can make it come true
